Class currencyconverter

java.lang.Object
com.example.currency.currencyconverter
public class currencyconverter extends Object
The CurrencyConverter class provides methods to manage and convert currency exchange rates.

    • addExchangeRate

      public void addExchangeRate(String currencyCode, double rate)
      Adds an exchange rate for a given currency code.
      Parameters:
      currencyCode - The code of the currency.
      rate - The exchange rate.

    • convert

      public double convert(double amount, String fromCurrency, String toCurrency)
      Converts an amount from one currency to another.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount to convert.
      fromCurrency - The currency code to convert from.
      toCurrency - The currency code to convert to.
      Returns:
      The converted amount.

    • updateExchangeRate

      public void updateExchangeRate(String currencyCode, double rate)
      Updates the exchange rate for a given currency code.
      Parameters:
      currencyCode - The code of the currency.
      rate - The new exchange rate.

    • getExchangeRate

      Returns:

    • getHistoricalRates

      public Double getHistoricalRates(String currencyCode)
      Gets the historical rates for a given currency code.
      Parameters:
      currencyCode - The code of the currency.
      Returns:
      A list of historical rates.

      Calculates the average exchange rate for a given currency code.

      Returns:
